amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit funds in this Act to be used to destroy any horse or mule belonging to the United States that has become unfit for service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 96 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds in this Act to be used to destroy any horse or mule belonging to the United States that has become unfit for service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deal (GA) amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
